channel.title: How yu do this?!?!?!?!
channel.description: how do yu add the amount of exp a monster gives you when you kill it?i want to change it a little higher on mine but i dont no how

item.title: How yu do this?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Ok Mate,

Search for:

TotalExp = (double)

Then you will see something like:

TotalExp = (double) (12 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for

Now this means whatever the first number is it will double that number for the amount of xp per 1 hp hit.

The example given would mean that every 1 hp a player hits they would get 24 experience.

Keep searching the given text above to change the exp.

Every group of text that looks like that accounts for a different attack style, eg. Strength experience.

Hope i helped

Thanx

Read full topic
